The Mystery Called Life
introtext
community2
community3
community1

We often question ourselves what our lives are really about and as we go on with this journey of life, we end up succumbing to different circumstances that shape our thoughts, feelings and actions. Sometimes to better understand ourselves, we need a guiding hand.
Proceed
community4
community5
Need help with a situation you are facing?
Need some positive motivation?
feeling
Depressed?
Discouraged?
Giving up?

Self-doubt?
Vengeful, Betrayed, Angry?
Fearful?
Lonely?
Overwhelmed/Stressed?
Jealous?
depression
This is a state that keeps us in a low mood and can cause changes in our thoughts, behaviour, motivation and sense of well-being.
Know that you are not alone in this fight because it is possible to be free from depression.
Remember that you are loved and cared for, whether it’s your family, relatives or even friends, even if you receive that love from one person.

Though it takes courage, its good to open up to people you know you can trust. Sometimes this may come naturally and eventually you will realize that you have overcome depression even if it may take a while.
And once you are able to do this, you can connect with others dealing with the same. It helps most of the time.
There is no need to store up feelings of depression within you. Rise up today and engage yourself appropriately in battling it.
discouragement
Sometimes we feel that nothing is right and won’t get any better. These are the moments we feel the strain of difficult times. It is also a time that we become uncertain of our future.
It is normal to feel discouraged but that doesn’t mean you have to stay in this state for long.
Feeling discouraged tends to make us forget that we still have the support of our friends, family and even a Higher Power(God).
Sometimes it is better to reach out to them for they could be a source of renewed strength and encouragement.
helping
motivating

string.a: Conquering depression:How i became my own hero

string.name: linktodiscouraged
string.a: Watch this whenever you feel discouraged in life

resources.string: given _up

string.name: linktogiving_up
string.a: When you feel like giving up

resources.string: There are certain things in life that are out of our control. Because of this, we carry two choices- either to give up or to keep going.
Remember it’s not the end. The fact that you are still around- alive- should be able to give you a reason to get up and keep going.
Many who are successful today failed so many times and were countlessly on the verge of giving up. However, they didn’t get stopped by the things they couldn’t control and kept going.
Giving up is a wall that we must break through. But to do that, we must acknowledge that we are not perfect and that we are alive and can still do so much more.
But because of how these certain things, whether it’s a task that was meant to be accomplished or the loss of something or someone, can be overwhelming, we often give up.
rejection
We often spend our time with our friends and family and do things together. These moments add value to our lives. However, there are those times we feel like we don’t belong.
Most of us try to fit in and when we don’t succeed in this, we feel it’s not OK.
As a result, we try changing who we are to become copies of others and indulge in things we really don’t want.
If you don’t fit in, it doesn’t matter because being different isn’t a bad thing.

Just create your own path where you do what you love because by doing this you will also set a path for others who find themselves in the same situation but are yet to build their confidence in order to create their own path.

string.name: linktorejected
string.a: Ever feel like you do not belong?

resources.string: selfdoubt

string.name: linktoselfdoubt2
string.a: If you are different be different

resources.string: feelinguseless
revenge
jealous

string.name: linktovengeance
string.a: What to do with revenge, anger and betrayal

string.name: linktojealousy2
string.a: The secret of slaying envy and jealousy

resources.string: When we question ourselves this way- Do I matter? Am I worth? Why am I here yet I am doing nothing? - Or say statements like- my contributions are nothing, am useless- we know that there is a sense of uselessness and hopelessness that creeps into us.
You ought to know that everything about you matters, even the small things that no one notices.
There is a reason for you being here so don’t worry about not feeling useful. The universe is big and that means that there will always be something that you will find yourself being useful.

You are worth it and there is so much more you can contribute. Life itself isn’t perfect because it is full of trials and tribulations and finding your purpose requires that you take a journey through life.

As you take this journey, you may even find others like you in the same situation and the best thing you can do is to also lift them up. That way you’ll also get to understand yourself and that you matter.
There times we become restless with anger to a point that we want to get even with someone or something in order to restore the peace that our lives once had.
This feeling, vengeance, mostly occurs when we experience betrayal of some sort.
Vengeance is indeed a powerful negative emotion that can lead to long-term hatred and that is why its not easy to get rid of the feeling.
Remember that deep down that you have to accept that things happen and cannot be rewritten. Holding a grudge within you does not build you because it arouses negative implications.

You need to learn to forgive and forget, to let go and move on. Its true to say that this takes time but it’s worth more than bottling up feelings, vengeance and hatred, that are constantly tearing down your life little by little.
Sometimes we end up feeling insecure around others and develop a first-person emotion- jealousy.
Jealousy hinders our ability to empathise with others and gets us distracted most of the time with the things we desire the most.
At this state, we tend to think a lot about ourselves so we have to learn how to deal with it.
It is indeed normal to feel jealous towards others but don’t let it control you.
In order to avoid the clutches of jealousy, you first need to acknowledge and accept that you are jealous.
If possible, communicate with the person you felt jealous towards. Tell them how you feel. Show some degree of honesty and apologize where you feel you are wronged them.
alone
stressed
Some of our day to day activities give us some overwhelmed feelings that make us wonder how we can go on or how bad things are going to be if we don’t finish the task delegated to us.

Most people in this situation feel like not opening up most probably because they don’t want to bother others with their problems. However, it sometimes can be helpful since it can help remove some weight of the overwhelming thoughts of stress especially with someone whom you feel can understand you better.
Under stress, we are normally not at our best.
We should understand that we are all flawed and some cases, stress becomes the norm.
We should identify what makes us feel stressed and if you don’t know if you are stressed, study your habits to see if they have changed.
Once you have done this, move to ways of destressing like take a rest.
There are times we feel that we are not connected with people, that the people around are not with you and don’t understand you.
We can be surrounded by people we know yet succumb to loneliness. This is mostly the case due to the quality of interactions we have with others.
It is normal to feel lonely since we never get a perfect interaction with others. However, when loneliness leads to feelings of depression, it can affect you both mentally and physically.

The best way on how you can treat your loneliness is y stepping out of your zone and go meet up with people even those whom you see everyday and you rarely talk to. Open up about yourself bit by bit until the time you eventually feel comfortable with people.
It’s not easy but the journey to treating loneliness is worth the take.
doubt
We want to believe in ourselves, be like that person who is confident in life. But our state of self-doubt prevents us from being that person.
Its good to know that you are worthy and are vital to this world. Why? Because we are all unique in our own ways since we can’t all be the same. It’s just that sometimes we can’t see our importance.
To be able to build your confidence, don’t just focus on what you are not because if you do, it’ll be difficult to understand yourself.
Know yourself, study yourself. Pay attention to know who you are and what you can do because there’s no another you.
motivation

Truth
honesty

you
changing
hardwork
happy
Happiness come from within your heart and not your surroundings.
Enthusiasm is the fuel of life. It helps get where you are going.
The best things come to those who don’t give up.
No matter how far the journey, keep going.
Whatever your goal is, never give up on it. Perseverance is the key that will lead you to your ultimate achievement.
Grow with your goal no matter how difficult things may turn out to be.

At times life feels meaningless and too hard to bear. The question that starts lingering in my mind is: ’Is there any meaning to life?’, but we must never give up about our strength, hopes and dreams that we want to fulfil. Then it is up to us to fight, have the will of fire and resist any temptations that threatens our paths to our goals. Fight till the end for your goal.
It is easier to go down a hill than to go up a hill but the view at the top is much better at the top.
Whatever you are calling impossible today may just need a matter of time and more determination to become a case study for others to draw inspiration from.
TextView
It is only when you see life clearly that you can define your limits and chose to go beyond them.
Obstacles don’t have to stop you. If you run into wall, don’t turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it or work your way round it
There are no gains without any pain.
Every mountain top is within reach if you just keep climbing.
You will never know what you can conquer until you push yourself beyond the impossible.
No matter how far the destination of your journey will be, keep walking because every step brings you closer to the end of the journey.
Strive to be stronger than yesterday because each day is presented with its own opportunity.
Keep fighting until there is no more fighting left to be done in the end - Clarke Munyao
There is no elevator to success, you have to take the stairs.
The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential…these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
There is so much to be done today yet I have done so little.
If it is to be, it is up to me to make a difference.
Success is not the key to happiness but happiness is the key to success: If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
If you want to be successful you must respect one rule-never lie to yourself.
If you want to build yourself, do it alone. If you want to achieve yourself, do it with God.
Opportunities are not offered, they are wrestled and worked for. This calls for perseverance and courage.
When you ask the best questions of yourself and others, you invite the best answers.
Everyone wants to go to heaven but no one wants to die. The truth is imaginable.

The true mind can whether all lies and illusions without being lost. The true heart can toughen the poison of hatred without being harmed. Since the beginning of time, darkness thrives in the void but always yields to purify light. Seek to be true in mind.
Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
Success is not final; failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. (Winston Churchill)
Sometimes, when you yourself are leaving life to the full, you forget elsewhere also continues to change like a chameleon.
Every cause has more than one effect.
If you look for the light, you will often find it but if you look for the dark that is what you will always see.
Words have no power to impress the mind without the exquisite horror of their reality.
Peace only holds meaning if it is created in reality. A peace born of illusion is nothing more than just a lie.
People live their lives bound by what is ‘right’ and ‘true’ based by their reality.
Never stop smiling, because the eyes are the windows to your soul and the smile is the door to your heart.
You are the engineer of your life. You are the ones to determine the building blocks upon which your life is to be built on.
No matter how much it hurts now, some day you will look back and realize that your struggles changed your life for the better and find happiness again.
It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitating others - Mr.Mutei
Our most profitable lessons are mostly learned from failure.
The most crippling failure disease is EXCUSES.
If you are doing your best, you will not have to worry about failure.
Many life’s failure are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
Success is a wonderful thing but don’t underestimate the value of failure. Failure teaches people many more things than success ever can.
The greatest failure is the fear to begin.

Serious minds value knowledge and excellence but joker minds don’t. The world and beyond is vast and full of knowledge. As humans, we should try to seek out some of this knowledge to the best of our ability in order to survive. But if we blankly live in this world without a care of any knowledge about it, we become a joker or even an alien to our world.
Every choice you make has consequences.
Don’t be fooled, everyone makes mistakes. No one is perfect.
No matter how big the will is, there will always be a way.
A pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity while an optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
It has never been and never will be easy work. But the road that is built in hope is more pleasant to the traveler than the road built in despair, even though they both lead to the same destination.
God gave us light but within us we also harbour darkness. Embrace the light that God gave us.

Plan for your future because that is where you can spend the rest of your life and believe in it to be great. But do not always worry about the troubles of the future for you cannot hold all the problems of the world.

Yesterday is a cancelled cheque, tomorrow is a promissory note but the present is the real cost…though hard forget things that hold you in your past, it is the rope that holds back your progress. Wield the time of now and believe you can make today better.
Our lives are driven by the choices we make.
The greatest obstacle to progress is lack of self-belief.
Happiness keeps you sweet, trials make you strong, sorrows make you human, failure keeps you humble, success keeps you growing and God keeps you going.
Value those who are around you and never want to leave your side for they know something about you that you don’t know that may be a requirement for you to grow with your goal.
Love all, trust a few. Do wrong to none.
United we stand, divided we fall.
For in nature of things, if we rightly consider, every person is far more glorious being themselves than being others.
At a time of universal deceit, telling the truth is a revolutionary act.
Do you wish people to speak well of you? If yes, then don’t speak well of yourself even up to a point of bragging.
No matter how dark it will be, there will always be light, a light that signifies hope for all. You just need to find it.
You are wise man today if you learned from the failures of the past.

It doesn’t matter who you are, who you were, who you aren’t or who you weren’t. Whatever that matter is where you are going. Aspire to do your best and strive to head in the right direction. Learn to wield the power of now so that even if there is no tomorrow, today you did your best you could.
A plan is a real thing and things projected are experienced. A plan once made and visualized becomes a reality along with other realities never to be destroyed but easy to be attacked.
No one should make you inferior without your consent.
The value of life is not in its duration but in its donation. You are not important because of how important you are but because of how effective you live.
Sometimes when it come to the people we love, there is no refuge but pain.
Too many people undervalue what they are and overvalue what they are not.
It is very unfortunate how people live their lives according to other people’s opinion.
Growth is a process of life. If one is not growing, then there is a problem. Therefore, as young people, we must realize that growth comes with responsibilities.
Sometimes the most difficult thing to do is the most important thing to do. All you need is a change of perspective.
There is no limit to how far you can go if you are sufficiently inspired. Just believe in yourself.
You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
It is really unfortunate how we are mentally socialized from childhood to believe in limits that are not real. Believe you can be able to break through these limits and stand firm.
It takes nothing to join the crowd but it takes everything to stand alone.
No one remembers you for standing in the crowd, but they remember you for standing out of it.
Belief is a mental state but faith is a relationship. Have faith in God and also in yourself.
Faith does not make things easy but possible.
It is okay to believe in something so strongly that you cannot be discouraged.
Challenges always come to prepare you for the great things that are coming your way so get ready for them.
There are times in life when even the smallest words or actions are infused with the most exquisite meanings. These are one of those moments of change in your life.
Your life is not just decided by fate, you must create the future you want by taking the right actions now.
In most cases, character is who you are when you are under pressure.
Life welcomes changes with open arms, sometimes it welcomes painful ones and sometimes it welcomes beautiful ones, but most of the time it welcomes both.
Never mistake your arrogance for confidence and then let your ignorance become you.
Good decisions come from experience and experiences come from bad decisions.
Sometimes we need to be hurt in order to grow, fail in order to know, lose in order to gain. Some lessons are best learnt through pain in order to bring a significant transformation in our lives.
Limitations live only in our minds, but if we use our imaginations, possibilities become limitless.
Life is a flash of beauty when used for the right purpose but life is a shadow seeking the darkness when used for an astray purpose. -John P.Kinda
Sometimes life is a thick fog for us not to see what lies ahead of us in our coming future. But in spite of this, we have to believe in the coming of a better future.
If you want to build yourself, do it alone. If you want to achieve yourself, do it with God. -Bryan Calvin
Friends talk to each other but real friends listen.
Even though we don’t realize it, we keep our friends close but our enemies closer.
I am a slow walker but never walk backwards - Abraham Lincoln
Seek God in all that you do for His grace is boundless and marvelous. He will guide you in your steps and show you the way.

Whenever pride seeks to take over because you fill you have achieved, don’t forget where you came from, who assisted you and why you achieved. Just humble yourself and ask the Almighty to take the prideful thoughts away and thank Him for He has done for you.
A vicious cycle is a cycle in which a problem creates more problems making the original problems worse than they were before. Seek to not be part of the vicious cycle.
Life is like an elevator. On your way up you sometimes have to stop to let some people off in order to continue going up.
Future generations will judge us not by what we say but by what we do.
Whatever you do, do well. Be good at it. Stand a little taller. Be a little better.
Life is not what it’s supposed to be. It’s what it is. The way you cope with it is what makes the difference.
People know what they do; frequently they know what they do, but they don’t know what they do does.
Believe there are no limits then fly. All things become possible when we truly believe.
You only live once so enjoy every moment in your life and create colours and be happy.
Consider that we are born not with purpose but with potential.
Work finally begins when the fear of doing nothing exceeds the fear of doing it badly.
Celebrate the cracks because that is how the light comes in.
Exhaust the little moment. Soon it dies. And be it gash or gold, it will not come again in this identical disguise.
When we are pushed to our lowest points, we become open to the greatest change.
It does not matter what life gives you. It’s what you do with what life gives you that makes the difference. The choice is always yours.
Destiny is a funny thing. You never know how things are going to work out. But if you keep an open mind and an open heart, you will definitely find your own destiny someday.
Many things that look scary in the dark become friendly when we shine a light on them.
Our children may learn from heroes of the past. Our task is to make ourselves the architects of the future. - Jomo Kenyatta
If you are free, you need to free somebody else. If you have some power, then your job is to empower somebody else.
It always seems impossible until it’s done - Nelson Mandela
What is my personal drive? Trying to make a difference and leaving a positive footprint - Robert Bob Collymore
It’s good to be careful but sometimes you to stop being scared and go for it. You never know till you try.
When confronting complex equations, the simplest solution is most often the correct one.
Today is tough, tomorrow is tougher and the day after tomorrow is beautiful but most people die tomorrow evening - Jack Ma
Life isn’t always about going for a head-on battle. You sometimes have to consider the sidelines.
If you get all caught up with the things right in front of you, you may lose sight of what is important.
Calm your mind before doing something. If you observe something with a calm mind, you will be able to discern the important things.
One of the deep secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others.
The past is what we build on. The present is what we build with. The future is what we build. Let your goals be in honour of building the future.
The measure of life is not in its length, but in what we do with it. So set your goals right.
Write your sad times in sand and your good times in stone. This helps in cherishing your happy moments to keep you happy.
Happiness makes up in height for what it does not have in length.
You being smart is you understanding quickly; but your ability is you acting well on the thing after you understand it.
The hard times teach us more than the easy times. So it is you to learn from the difficult times that come your way.
The hardest truth is better than the sweetest words that are not true.

The Mystery Called Life keeps you smiling.
If you liked using The Mystery Called Life, share it with family and friends.
